revised_title: An Account of Locust Swarms and Their Impact on Agriculture in Eastern Europe
tldr: This article describes the devastation caused by locust swarms in Walachia, Moldavia, and Transilvania in the years 1747 and 1748, as well as their impact on agriculture and the environment. The author provides detailed accounts of the swarms' behavior, life cycle, and methods of control, emphasizing the importance of early detection and intervention to prevent further damage.
